text: Sandra Martins Cavalcanti de Albuquerque (30 August 1925 – 11 March 2022) was a Brazilian politician, linguist, and academic. She was a deputy from 1987 to 1995. She was born in Belém, Pará, Brazil. Cavalcanti died on 11 March 2022 in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil at the age of 96.Morre aos 96 anos a ex-deputada Sandra Cavalcanti ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Pará Category:Brazilian academics Category:Linguists Category:People from Belém
title: Sandra Cavalcanti
